text: Tethea trifolium is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It is found in China (Heilongjiang, Jilin), the Russian Far East and Japan (Hokkaido, Honshu). The habitat consists of various types of mixed and broad-leaved forests. The larvae feed on Malus mandshurica and Prunus avium.A review of the Thyatirin- moths (Lepidoptera, Drepanidae: Thyatirinae) of the Russian Far East ==References== Category:Moths described in 1895 Category:Thyatirinae
title: Tethea trifolium
